list.name: Changes
list.comment: Sleep stages writing is working. Configuring logger made a strong difference.

task.summary: Default task

Mostly working app with functionality in main window features. Menus are not implemented. Annotation and EDF classes are well developed. Fell a sleep on the keyboard and introduce a bug on multuple EDF load. 90% move of hypnogram drawing from viewer to annotation class. Need step function identification for spectrogram list. Neither y axis of x axis implemented in signals.
Hypnogram labels working again after inverting hypnogram axis. Created a function to return sleep stage mapping.
Hypnogram redraws after combo box selection. Deleted hypnogram plotting function within the interface. Will use the plotting funciton within AnnotationXmlClass - Sleep Stages
Created function if EDF Signals to identify stepped and continuous functions from the sampling rate. can identify eeg, stepped, and continuous signals.

Tracking down a bug where signals are not drawn to the interface. Instead new windows are created. Some evidence that this is an interaction between default use of matplotlib and PySide 6.
I removed or commented out alternative plotting functionailty through the code base. However that did not fixe the issue.

Tracking down a bug where signals are not drawn to the interface. Instead new windows are created. Some evidence that this is an interaction between default use of matplotlib and PySide 6.
I removed or commented out alternative plotting functionailty through the code base. However that did not fixe the issue.

Tried suggested fix. Made it worst. Reverting to previous code in next commit. Also noticed that same issue exist for load annotation. Issue likely emerged when deleting unused matplotlib related libraries

Figure commands removed from the parent widget block so that all figur-canvas-layout information is in one block. Code work with expected buggy behavior. Switched to working with annotation code since the function is simpler. Turns out two figure windows are generated upon load; resulting in one figure for each supported type of histogram.
Seemed to fine bug which a down stream consequence of not turning off the combox signals while updating the list.
Mad same change for EDF file load. Instead of a handful of figures created only two figures created. Progress.
including workspace.xml in commit. File maintains project level information
I replaced the edf graphics code in the edf plot with the code in annotation plot which is working. The did change in code did not work. Will be looking at places signal combo boxes are changed next
Windows external to the gui are no longer being created. Epoch buttons seem to be working. Upon loading a new edf. wpoch does not reset to one.
Added reset function which is helping. Need to take a break. When returning will create a function for explicitly resetting widgets to default values.
Added reset function which is helping. Need to take a break. When returning will create a function for explicitly resetting widgets to default values.
Create multiple dialog boxes and message pop up to have action taken for the File and Help menu. Just need to the Generate menu item. Then the first pass is done.

Created stub functions for all menu items. I deleted the signal export item since I don't intend to include. I considered making the signal statistics an item; decided agaisnt since signal statistics are included in the edf summary. Annotation and sleep stages exports are not working while not providing an erros.
Annotation export working. Changed the extension to .xlsx.
Added signal label to signal label upon completion of the multitaper spectrogram computation. Created a logging_config file to centralize logging setup.
Using logging_config.py to set up logging across application. Config is working well. Will return to debugging Sleep Stages export which is resulting in an empty file being written.
Sleep stages writing is working. Configuring logger made a strong difference.
